title: Azure SDK Repositories Reference
body: Azure SDK repositories (Azure/azure-sdk-for-net, Azure/azure-sdk-for-python, etc.) provide official client libraries for Azure services. Contains authentication patterns, service-specific APIs, retry policies, logging configurations, and integration examples. Essential for building applications that interact with Azure services using modern SDK patterns.
